Uses of Interface
golad.lib.Move

  • Packages that use Move 
    Package Description
    golad.bot
    This package provides bot related classes and interfaces.
    golad.lib
    This package provides classes and interfaces for observation and manipulation of GOLAD boards.
    golad.lib.impl
    This package provides abstract and concrete implementations of the concepts defined in golad.lib

      Methods in golad.lib that return Move 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Move MoveFactory.createBirthMove(int x, int y, int[] sx, int[] sy)
      Creates a valid move that creates an allied cell on the board.
      Move MoveFactory.createKillMove(int killX, int killY)
      Creates a valid Move that kills a cell on the board.
      Move MoveFactory.createTestMove(Board board, CellState player, Move.Type type, int x, int y, int[] sx, int[] sy)
      Creates a Move validated against the provided Board for the provided player.
